Explanation
:  Since the claimant did not begin his period of AWOL until February 14, 1991, he satisfactorily completed his initial enlistment and one reenlistment period, ending December 28, 1990.  The time from December 29, 1990, to December 23, 1991—the date of discharge—cannot be considered honorable service due to the AWOL period of over 180 consecutive days, which constitutes a statutory bar to benefits.
